text:
Mel B Comes Face to Face With Hollywood Medium Tyler Henry & Things Got Crazy

Mel B isn’t going through the best time right now, which is why it’s important for her to receive a message of good faith — even if it’s from another world.

Thankfully, that’s where Hollywood medium Tyler Henry comes in.

The former Spice Girl got choked up when Tyler channeled her grandfather during a reading.

“I immediately have to highlight a man that’s coming through who’s kind of insistent to connect,” Tyler said. “And when he’s coming through there’s an acknowledgement basically from his perspective he feels like he got to live a pretty decent long period of life, but he feels like his life was cut short… He’s saying he withheld telling people about his diagnosis to some extent.”

Watch the clip above, and grab a tissue.
